T02n1413u_001:985: na kevalaṃ tīrthādi sahajapīṭhopapīṭhādiṣu ca | tamāha -

T02n1413u_001:992: svaśarīraṃ sukharūpaṃ tasya dhātuḥ pīṭhādirūpatayā bāhyeṣu pravṛttiḥ | tenāha -

T02n1413u_001:994: iti | dehā śarīrasadṛśaṃ tīrthaṃ sukharūpaṃ yadi bhavati tadā sustham |

T02n1413u_001:996: evaṃ punarādhyātmikeṣu pīṭhādeṣu ca sañcārādināvagantavvaṃ teṣu ca sukhamayena sañcāraṃ na vāyumātreṇeti |

T02n1413u_001:1016: evaṃ tattvahīnena sarvvamantraśāstraṃ dharmma vā avidyāgṛhītaiḥ kṣayaṃ yāti evaṃ samudāyārthaḥ |

T02n1413u_001:1031: rāgādabhilaṣitadharmmādiṣu krīḍā yā sā tattvarahitatayā suṣṭhusaṃgṛhītā avidyaiveti |
T02n1413u_001:1033: anye ca lokāḥ vyākhyānaṃ kurvvanti ṣaṭhanti ca |

T02n1413u_001:1045: dhmānena nopalabhyate svabhāvasiddhatvāt gurūparijñānamātreṇopalabhyate nābhimānādinā | tadāha -
T02n1413u_001:1046: vuddhi viṇāsai maṇa marai jahi [ tuḍhḍhai ] ahimāṇa |
T02n1413u_001:1047: so māāmaa parama-kalu tahi kimbajjhai jhāṇa | | iti

T02n1413u_001:1049: tasmin sthāne abhimānatā ahaṃkāra ātmātmīyakalpanā truṭyati kṣayaṃ yāti |
T02n1413u_001:1050: yasmāt sa māyāmayaparamakalārūpaṃ kaleti ṣoḍaśo kaleva nārtha karoti kiñcit |
T02n1413u_001:1056: yasmin sthāne bhavabhakṣitaṃ punarapyatraiva kṣayavivarjjitaṃ evaṃ bhāvābhāvarahitaḥ |
T02n1413u_001:1060: yataḥ buddhādilakṣaṇaṃ sarvvaṃ māyāvat bhāvābhāvamiti prasaṅgaḥ |
T02n1413u_001:1061: kintarhi kalpanayogāt tat tathoktaḥ | evaṃ punaḥ

T02n1413u_001:1085: sārtherājñātā teṣu noktayā sarvvaṃ saṃbādhitaṃ bhavati |

T02n1413u_001:1643: tādṛśaḥ paramamahāsukha ekakṣaṇe saṃsāraduściritāśeṣaṃ karoti | tathā -
T02n1413u_001:1644: dukkha- divāara atthagau ūvai taravai sukka |
T02n1413u_001:1645: ṭhia- ṇimmāṇe ṇimmiau teṇavi maṇḍala- cakka || iti |
T02n1413u_001:1646: yathā grīṣmakāladuḥkhadivākaraḥ astamito bhavati tadā atyantaśītalatvaṃ karoti |
T02n1413u_001:1651: yena nirmmāṇasthitena viśvaṃ buddhasaṃvṛtyā nirmmāṇaṃ nirmmiṇoti |
T02n1413u_001:1654: cittahi citta ṇihālu vaḍha saala vimucca-kudiṭṭhi |
T02n1413u_001:1655: paramamahāsuhe sojjha parū tasu āattā siddhi | | iti |
T02n1413u_001:1660: na kiñcinnāma vidyeta bhrāntyā sarvvamidaṃ jagat | |
T02n1413u_001:1667: mukkau cittagaenda karū ettha viappa ṇu pucchā |
T02n1413u_001:1668: gaaṇa- girī ṇaijala piau tahi taḍa vasai saiccha | |
T02n1413u_001:1672: kutaḥ ? yataḥ sarvve bhāvastattvātmakāstattvāśritāḥ tattveṣu nilīnāḥ bhavanti |
T02n1413u_001:1676: narakaṃ yānti kārūṇikaiśca daśakuśalakarmmapathaparipālanayā sarvvaṃ susthaṃ bhavati |
T02n1413u_001:1677: tena gaganagiriṇā hastivat sarvvavyāpakatveṣu nadyāṃ jalaṃ pibanti |
T02n1413u_001:1678: yaḥ purūṣo yataḥ tasmin taṭeṣu mahāsukhanadyāṃ śoṣayati |
T02n1413u_001:1679: idaṃ mahāsukhe'pi vikalpamātraṃ tasyā saṅgamiti bhāvārthaḥ |
T02n1413u_001:1680: visaa- gaende kare gahia jima mārai paḍihāi |
T02n1413u_001:1681: joi kavaḍiāra jima tima taho ṇissari jāi | |
T02n1413u_001:1682: tathā viṣayagajendreṣu cakṣurādiṣu sarvvavastuṣu gṛhītvā indriyaviṣayādibhiḥ kareṇa grahaṇamiva dantinā tadā māraṇamiva pratibhāsate |
T02n1413u_001:1683: [ yāvat pratibhāsyati tāvat kasya viṣayiṇasya ca] |
T02n1413u_001:1689: na kavaḍikāradyāḥ tasya bādhyate lokasya pratibhāsa eveti |
T02n1413u_001:1690: evaṃ bhakṣyābhakṣyeṣu na lipyate iti yāvat | tathācāha -
T02n1413u_001:1691: jo bhava so ṇīvvāṇa khalu sa u ṇa maṇṇahu aṇṇa |
T02n1413u_001:1692: ekka sahāve virahia ṇimmala mai paḍīvaṇṇa |
T02n1413u_001:1695: yathā yuganaddhakrameṣūktamāryya- nāgārjjunapādena bhavanirvvāṇetyādinā ca iha etadeva yat bhavanirvvāṇaṃ khalu (144)
T02n1413u_001:1697: sarveṣāṃ dvayaṃ dvayavacaneṣu savijñeyayuganaddhadvayaṃ tacca bhedamanyaṃ vijñeyāditi |
T02n1413u_001:1698: kiṃ tarhi ekasvabhāvena yadadvayaṃ sarvaśāstreṣu siddhāntaṃ tat tasmādavi rahitam ekānekabhāvam |
T02n1413u_001:1699: kintu advayo'pi nirmalaḥ pratipannaḥ paramādvayamiti bhāvaḥ |
T02n1413u_001:1701: gharahi ma thakku ma jāhi vaṇe jahi tahi maraga pariāraṇa |
T02n1413u_001:1702: saalu ṇirantara vohi- ṭhiu kahi bhava kahi ṇivvāṇa | |
T02n1413u_001:1705: kiṃ tarhi niścitaṃ dvayasthāneṣu gamyādvikalpaṃ jāyate |
T02n1413u_001:1707: yasmin yasmin sthitvā vā caṃkramaṇabhakṣādiṃ kṛtvā tatra manasya paribhāvanaṃ kuru alīkaṃ manaḥ sa ca vijñapti kuru |
T02n1413u_001:1712: tadiha kudhībhiḥ mūḍhatvena parikalpitaṃ bhavanirvāṇayoradvayoḥ kenedaṃ na syāt uktanyāyādapi |
T02n1413u_001:1714: kutaḥ? yataḥ ādāveva viśvasyotpādaṃ nāsti tat kimiti dṛśyate |
T02n1413u_001:1721: naivaṃ lokaṃ na nirvāṇaṃ manyante tattvadarśinaḥ | |
T02n1413u_001:1725: tasmāt siddhaṃ paramādvayaṃ bodhirūpaṃ sa cāha -
T02n1413u_001:1726: ṇau ghare ṇau vaṇe vohi ṭhiu ehu pariāṇahu bheu |
T02n1413u_001:1728: idam upalakṣaṇāyāṃ na ghare na vaneṣu bodhisthitam |
T02n1413u_001:1729: evaṃ bhedaṃ parijānāsi sandhyābhāṣāntare'pi gṛhaṃ śarīraṃ vanaṃ ghaṭapaṭādiṣu tatra na bodhiḥ |
T02n1413u_001:1731: evaṃ bhedaṃ yat dṛśyate lokādi tat sarvam utpannavināśinaḥ |
T02n1413u_001:1734: yairvikalpanā vikalpasi samastā saṅgatā tyajasīti vistaraḥ |
T02n1413u_001:1736: ehu so appā ehu paru jo paribhāvai kovi |
T02n1413u_001:1737: te viṇu vandhe veṭṭhi kiu appa vimukkau tovi | | iti |
T02n1413u_001:1738: idamātmā na idaṃ paraḥ yena kenacidviparibhāvitaṃ tena vinā bandhanena ātmānaṃ viṭakitaṃ vikalīkṛtaṃ mukto'pi svabhāvayātaṃ tadā no muktaḥ tasmāt svaparavibhāgaṃ na kriyate iti yāvat | tadiha -
T02n1413u_001:1739: para appāṇa ma bhanti karū saala ṇirantara vuddha |
T02n1413u_001:1740: paha se ṇimmala paramapau citta sahāve suddha | | iti | (146)
T02n1413u_001:1742: parañcātmadañca ekasvabhāvaṃ na dvayarūpeṇa bhrāntiṃ kuru kintarhi sakalasattvādhātunirantarādāveva svabhāvena śuddhaḥ tadādāveva paribhāvanāyānantakamalāvṛtā na buddhātmānaṃ paribhāvayanti |
T02n1413u_001:1743: evaṃ dvayarahitena buddhaḥ saḥ nirmalaṃ paramacitaṃ svabhāvatorūpaṃ bodhicittaṃ svabhāvarahitatayā -
T02n1413u_001:1744: addaa citta- tarūaraha gau tihuvaṇe vitthāra |
T02n1413u_001:1745: karūṇā phullīphala dharai ṇāu paratta ūāra | | iti |
T02n1413u_001:1746: ukte sati paropakāraṃ sūcayati yadadvayaṃ cittaṃ yogināṃ taddharantu bhavarājaḥ |
T02n1413u_001:1751: sarveṣāṃ sarvāsāṃ śuddhatvādi paripūrayati iti te tayā | | su
T02n1413u_001:1752: [ suṇṇa tarūvara phulliau karūṇā viviha vicitta |
T02n1413u_001:1753: aṇṇā bhoa parattaphalu ehu sokkha paru citta |
T02n1413u_001:1754: suṇṇa taruvara ṇikkarūṇa jahi puṇu mūla ṇa sāha |
T02n1413u_001:1755: tahi ālamūla jo karai tasu paḍibhajjāi vāha | |
T02n1413u_001:1756: ekkemvī ekkevvi taru te kāraṇe phala ekka |
T02n1413u_001:1757: e abhiṇṇā jo muṇai so bhavaṇivvāṇa vimukka | | (147)
T02n1413u_001:1759: jo atthīaṇa ṭhīaū so jai jāi ṇirāsa |
T02n1413u_001:1760: khaṇḍa sarāve bhikkha varū cchaḍahu e gihavāsa | |
T02n1413u_001:1762: manasi vihāya tadā sattveṣu karūṇāvantaḥ yasmādāyāti |
T02n1413u_001:1763: yaḥ kaścidathinaḥ sa [ yadi ] nirāsaṃ yāti mayā lokena kiñcit dattam |
T02n1413u_001:1769: para- ūāra ṇa kīaū atthi ṇa dīau dāṇa |
T02n1413u_001:1770: ehu saṃsāre kavaṇa phalu varū cchaḍḍahu appāṇa | | iti |
T02n1413u_001:1771: kintena bhogena gṛheṇa vā kriyate yataḥ paropakāraṃ na bhavati |
T02n1413u_001:1773: tacca tena dhanena evam idaṃ saṃsāre sthitatvāt kiṃ phalaṃ bhavati na bhavati [yāva]d varamidam ātmānaṃ tyajāmaḥ |
T02n1413u_001:1783: svārthaṃ vāpi parārthaṃ vā sādhitaṃ me śubhaṃ yataḥ |
